page.title: 16 Around the World on a Bike.
page.content: On Tuesday 3rd 1985, six children from Highfields School went to the local shops to meet a man called Nick Sanders.He was going to try and ride around the World,on a bike,in eighty days.The children were Samantha, Zoe,Vanessa,Vishav,Darren, and Carl.We asked why he was doing it. He said he was helping a charity called "Save the Children Fund" and was sponsored by a chain of Supermarkets.He was setting off from Manchester and was hoping for warm,sunny weather which would be cool enough to ride in.He was 27 years old and was most exited about going to Singapore.He said he was taking spare underpants with him.Afterwards we had our photograph taken with him and it appeared in the local newspaper.
